item.title: We are backâ€¦
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: and boy what a mess! We've been away at Christine's brother's wedding in Boston, during that time a hurricane decided to kick Orlando in the ass. If you've emailed me in the last couple of days I would recommend trying again. We are back, safe and the house is intact, with electricity and internet! If you can, please donate blood and to the Red Cross for the folks who weren't so lucky.
